p: The essential oil of Salvia officinalis showed moderate activity (EC 50 of 50 ± 3 µg/mL) against BVDV. Among the various constituents of the essential oil of Salvia officinalis L., the trans-caryophylleneshowed slight activity (EC50 of 90 µM) and the monocyclic sesquiterpene α-humulene was found as an active component (EC50 of 36 µM).
